name: SUPER YURI RPG! #Yurijam
description:
A pair of female adventurers venture out into the dungeons to defeat a dark force that other non-Yuri adventurers have failed to conquer!

Use your "moves" that includes fiery words of encouragement, hugs, and more! in order to help Kuro-chan; your partner to conquer the Dungeon!

This game was made for #yurijam

Details about time spent (during Jam):
Started on 2nd of September => 24th of October 2015
in a span of 6 (took a week off :P) weeks (approx, 6 hours per week)

Contact : Twitter
for Tweets regarding the game, I will be using the #SYRPG hashtag!

Updates are to be expected, since this game is not what i aimed for it to be due to the deadline and also my busy daily life!
Checkout the Devlogs, and Topics I've posted for more details!

TOTAL UPDATES = 5
(last updated on the 28th of July 2018)
